Title: Fix pointer
Description: You need to declare a string type variable with the value left and return this variable

Title: Line length
Description: A string is passed to the input, you need to return its length

Title: Uppercase
Description: You need to return a string containing only uppercase characters from the original string

Title: Reliable Path
Description: Need to find a trusted path. Paths are represented as strings passed in an array. A trusted path is one in which all characters are in uppercase. The index of the trusted path must be returned.

Title: Decode Text
Description: You need to decode the text. To do this, you need to take all the words starting with a capital letter from the source text and put them in the resulting array in reverse order.

Title: Crooked division
Description: The program split the text incorrectly. You have to fix it. To do this, you need to put the text together and separate it using delimiters: +, -, *, /

Title: Clear Path Matrix
Description: You need to fix the path matrices that were corrupted during a program failure. It is known that in the maritza the path is indicated by binary characters, as well as the start and end points of the path ([S], [F]), therefore all other characters are needed replace with 0.
